metadata.synopsis: Players comment when approaching Mizora's pod in the back of the Tadpoling Centre, provided she is there.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Recruit Wyll through the debugbook- Use the debugbook to go to region -> COL -> Tadpoling Centre- Walk towards the back of the Tadpoling Centre, near Mizora's pod- This PAD will play upon entering S_COL_Mizora_PodApproach_Box_ab898639-200e-4cf5-a693-dcb27d3a4fcc

0.speaker: Player
0.text: That pod - is that Mizora inside?
